author: remm
msg: - Make use of the new InstallOptions helper DLL to display a page asking
- user/pass used for the admin webapp
- port number on which to install Tomcat
Then the user can log in to the admin webapp and change
- Create some shorcuts to the admin webapp and the TC start page.
- The way the values are filled in in the config files is a big hack, since
NSIS doesn't support filtering (yet). Once filtering is in, we can add some more
options, and clean up the script.

author: craigmcc
msg: Jon's eagle eyes saw a createSocket call that I had failed to catch.

author: amyroh
msg: Add property change support for DefaultContext so that interested Listeners
can be notified of its property changes.
Add "defaultContext" property change handle to ServerLifecycleListener.
